text: Nimen feng'an la de mingling er jianmie di jun zhi chu, an la que yi dui nimen shijian ta de yue yan; zhidaole zai ta shi nimen kanjian nimen suo xi'ai de zhanlipin zhihou, nimen jing shiruo, nei zheng, weikang (shizhe) de mingling. Nimen zhong you tanlian jinshi de, you qitu houshi de. Sihou, ta shi nimen likai diren, yibian ta shiyan nimen. Ta que yi raoshu nimen. An la duiyu xinshimen shi you enhui de
